title: COX'S BAZAR
description: Cox's Bazar is a renowned beach town in Bangladesh, boasting the world's longest sandy beach. It attracts tourists with its serene views, vibrant markets, and stunning sunsets, offering a perfect retreat for beach lovers.

title: SREEMANGAL
description: Sreemangal, in northeastern Bangladesh, is famed for its lush tea gardens, scenic landscapes, and rich biodiversity. Known as the 'Tea Capital of Bangladesh,' it is a haven for nature enthusiasts and wildlife lovers seeking tranquility.

title: SUNDARBANS
description: The Sundarbans, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is the largest mangrove forest on Earth. Home to the iconic Royal Bengal Tiger and diverse wildlife, it offers a unique ecosystem of unparalleled natural beauty and ecological significance.
